short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Press Ctrl+Shift+Right or Ctrl+Shift+Left (Command+Shift+Right or Command+Shift+Left on a Mac) to flip through window tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow user to flip through browsers tab. You can easily change you current browser tabs with the help of these command.

Press Ctrl+Shift+Right or Ctrl+Shift+Left to flip through tabs
